aka: The Grass Is Greener Everywhere Else

cast.name: 米罗斯洛·巴卡 Miroslaw Baka
马尔塔·克鲁博维奇 Marta Klubowicz

this_title: Überall ist es besser, wo wir nicht sind
trans_title: 我们不在的地方都要好得多
The Grass Is Greener Everywhere Else
introduction: Jerzy (Miroslav Baka) is a resident of Warsaw who has decided to try and make his way out to the West. He hopes to wind up in the U.S. Instead, he finds himself in Berlin doing low-skill, under-the-counter work, earning his living by hustling jobs and changing hard currency (more or less Director Klier’s own fate). There, he runs into a woman he's met before, who is attempting the same transition - only her low-skill work is prostitution. The two live marginally, keeping fragmented, disjointed contact with each other.
chinese_title: 我们不在的地方都要好得多
foreign_title: Überall ist es besser, wo wir nicht sind
